Summoner Almors: Greetings, my name is Almors. I am the Summoner of the Ivory Tower in Oren. This is my cat, Pako. Pardon my appearance, I have been recuperating here at my aunt's house. I had to get out of Oren's bitter cold. I do wish that I could return to the Ivory Tower to finish my project... Although the slower pace around here is comforting... Ah, I see that you are an apprentice Summoner! Have you come to fight a duel with me, by chance?
